student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! Let’s talk about clothes. What do you and your friends usually wear?
That’s cool! Do you and your friends wear the same color jeans, or are they different?
Got it! Do you and your friends like to wear t-shirts with pictures or just plain ones?
Nice! Pictures on t-shirts can be fun. Do you and your friends ever wear matching outfits, or do you all choose different styles?
That’s great! It’s fun to have your own style. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
